name: (Boot-)LegoVR
description:
CURRENTLY TESTED ONLY ON OCULUS QUEST WITH OCULUS LINK

Inspired by Lego, this VR prototype allows you to build whatever you want in Virtual Reality! Ideal for Pixel and Voxel Art creation, Kids and Adults.

Requires a Virtual Reality Headset and a Compatible Computer.

Credits: Andrea Rosini

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" (WinterSemester 2020/21)
